response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and my aim is to ensure we find a mutually beneficial solution. After careful consideration, I propose to offer the product to you at a price of $1,000,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the value I receive for the product and ensuring you achieve a substantial return on your investment. I look forward to discussing this proposal further and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 1000000}
